name: Dandy II Entrance Bench
description: Inspired by the original Dandy bench by Kifu Paris, the Dandy II Entrance Bench is the ultimate luxury seating. The seating area is inlaid in cream shagreen and the frame, legs and sides of the bench are completely inlaid in bronze-patina brass. On the left and right side of the bench both armrests are in upholstered with white vachette.
